# Default Ignore Patterns
# These patterns are merged with .gitignore for file discovery

# Version control
.git
.gitignore
.svn
.hg

# Dependencies and packages
node_modules
vendor
.pnp
.pnp.js

# Build outputs
dist
build
target
out
output
*.min.js
*.min.css
*.bundle.js

# Cache and temp directories
.cache
tmp
temp
*.tmp
*.temp
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# IDE and editor files
.vscode
.idea
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace
.project
.classpath
.settings

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs and databases
*.log
logs
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3
*.db

# Test and coverage outputs
coverage
.nyc_output
htmlcov
.tox
.nox
.pytest_cache

# Documentation build
docs/_build
site

# Binary and media files
*.exe
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib
*.bin
*.o
*.a
*.lib
*.obj
*.pyc
*.pyo
__pycache__
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear
*.zip
*.tar
*.tar.gz
*.tgz
*.rar
*.7z
*.pdf
*.doc
*.docx
*.xls
*.xlsx
*.ppt
*.pptx

# Image files (usually not source)
*.png
*.jpg
*.jpeg
*.gif
*.bmp
*.ico
*.svg
*.webp
*.mp3
*.mp4
*.avi
*.mov
*.wav
*.flac

# Lock files
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
poetry.lock
Pipfile.lock
Gemfile.lock
composer.lock
Cargo.lock

# Large data files
*.csv
*.tsv
*.jsonl
*.ndjson
*.parquet
*.feather
*.hdf5
*.h5
*.pkl
*.pickle
*.npy
*.npz

# Configuration that shouldn't be parsed
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local
*.pem
*.key
*.cert
*.crt
secrets.yaml
secrets.yml
secrets.json
